page.title: 02 BOUNDS END
page.content:
Bounds End
Arts and crafts Recently the arts and crafts have been abandoned due to the recent development of modern machinery. Before the machines came the hedges and ditches were restored and looked after by the men of the village. Some people have decided to restart the woodwork craft in the desolate area.
Attitudes to people in the area Many people are too busy to stand around and gossip so much of the time people would just mind their own business.
Customs As this area has the border of Staplehurst-Cranbrook in it the council
